about_the_game:
After waking up with no memory of who you are or where you are, you must investigate the apartment where you are currently situated for any potential clues that could provide insight into the situation.

Ketamine is a puzzle game with elements of horror, set in a building with three apartments, each with a puzzle piece that can reveal what your memory wants to hide. Why are you there? Where are the other residents? What happened in this mysterious place? And most importantly, how do you escape?

Features:

- First-person exploration with puzzles to solve and pieces to fit together.
- Atmosphere with horror elements.
- Designed to be a one-session experience lasting 30-60 minutes.

content_descriptors.notes: In this game, there are descriptions of suicide attempts, violence, and sexual content.

name: Ketamina

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+ 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel (R) Core (TM) i3-4005U CPU @ 1.70GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: "Ketamine" is a First-Person game in which you need to uncover why you woke up without any memory in an apparently unremarkable apartment, until you discover the secrets of the resident and consider whether you really want to stay or leave.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
